snippet: New York's three state-owned ski resorts are pledging to generate 100 percent of their energy from renewable sources by the year 2030....

headline.main: Notable Career Ends With Sentencing in United Airlines Case
headline.print_headline: Notable Career Ends With Sentencing in United Airlines Case

lead_paragraph: New York's three state-owned ski resorts are pledging to generate 100 percent of their energy from renewable sources by the year 2030.
